title: Really achieving your childhood dreams
description: In 2007, Carnegie Mellon professor Randy Pausch, who was dying of pancreatic cancer, delivered a one-of-a-kind last lecture that made the world stop and pay attention. This moving talk will teach you how to really achieve your childhood dreams. Unmissable.
author: Randy Pausch
keywords: TED, talks, culture, disease, education, life, self
